attributes.action: place paper recycling bins outside every overground station, underground station and bus stop
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every week, a large amount of free newspaper's are given away to commuters. Commuters should be given the oppurtunity to recyle this paper, without going out of their way to do so. Paper recycling bins should be placed outside or inside each overground station , underground station and bus stop to give the commuters the choice of recycling.
